QuestData.Title: Hyphae Patrol: The Stalks
QuestData.Description:
<Marasmius sighs.>
They're at it again, up in the Stalks.$b$BSeems like we didn't give them enough of a thrashing the first time, eh? What say you and I team up again and teach those younglings a lesson they won't forget?$b$BLet me know when you're ready and we'll get 'em, just like before!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the fae rings and slay $2oa Masked Invaders in The Stalks.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmph, serves them right. Think they can go stomping around my grove? I am the only one who gets to do any stomping! I am the one who stomps!
